title: UTF-8 Byte Stream Decoder
name: LGF_DecodeUtf8
description: Decodes a UTF-8 encoded byte stream into a WString

input.name: startPos
input.description: Position in byte stream to start decoding from

input.name: count
input.description: Number of character (not bytes) to decode; 0: byte stream is decoded until end

return_value.description: Status of the FC, Error identification
